resources.string: Talented solution developer with more than 4 years of experience and extensive education in full stack application development following modern software development life cycle (SDLC) methodologies. Well-trained in the use of advanced programming technologies, focused on Java-based tools such as JavaFX, Hibernate, Oracle ATG, Servlet, and JSP. Able to design and develop optimized databases using Oracle, MySQL, and PostgreSQL, while applying industry best practices to write readable, efficient code.
ETISALAT EGYPT, New Cairo, Egypt · 2018-2019 Telecommunications service provider. ATG Java Developer Used ATG framework to enhance e-commerce system, adding new features to expand project scope.
Tasks Performed: Added new features and orders to e-commerce system by creating views in JSP and Servlet and Handled integration between E-Shop and other systems to complete the ordering process.

Achievements: Created special offers and events such as Black Friday, ensuring system uptime and accuracy during a high volume of orders. Technologies Used: Java, ATG Framework, Servlet, JSP, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, SQL, Eclipse, SVN, Windows.
WE COMPANY, Smart Village, Egypt · 2015-2018 Telecommunications service provider. Full Stack Java Developer Developed back-end and front-end components using Java and Angular.
Tasks Performed: Managed notification system which sends reminder and offer messages to customers and Developed system to calculate reseller commissions.

Achievements: Contributed to developing system for agents to send messages to customers manually, such as password resets and special offers. System exports statistical spreadsheets for financial analysis. Technologies Used: Java, Hibernate, Angular, Servlet, JSP, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, JSON, AJAX, REST, SOAP, SQL, PostgreSQL, Eclipse, Git, Maven, Ant, JUnit, Sonar, JACOC
